abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid33326353, pmid33125934, pmid33224380, pmid33289811, pmid32475877, pmid33247924, pmid33290544, pmid33242917, pmid32886755, pmid33298533, pmid33001856, pmid33232190, pmid33289808, pmid32476607
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.12.21
